title: Vehicle operator licensing: local authority inbox

details.description: This tool allows local councils and passenger transport authorities to look up electronic bus service registrations submitted to the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA)
details.more_information:
This tool is for local councils and passenger transport authorities. 

You need a user ID and password to access the system. If you don't have these, you can request them by email or by calling the VOSA helpline.

$C
**VOSA helpline**  
<self.service@vosa.gov.uk>   
0300 123 9000
$C

*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
details.introduction: You can use this tool to look up electronic bus service registrations submitted to the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA).

details.description: Includes setting up test stations, employing drivers and becoming a vehicle operator

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
